openapi.name: OpenAPI Design & Validation

capabilities.spec_validation: Validate OpenAPI document structure and completeness

when_to_use: Breaking API requirements into user stories
Aligning UX form flows with backend validation contracts
Reviewing endpoint naming, status codes, and error payload patterns
example_queries: Validate this OpenAPI spec and list critical issues
Which endpoints are missing standardized error responses?

Identify endpoints likely to break pagination consistency

agent_instructions.usage: Run targeted checks on endpoint groups and convert findings into story tasks and acceptance criteria.
agent_instructions.integration: Reference findings in project-plan.md, dependencies.md, and user stories that involve API contracts.
